actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to extend the congratulations of the Congress on the 100th anniversary of Eastern Kentucky University's role in higher education.

summary.text: Expresses the greetings and extends the congratulations of the Congress on the one hundredth anniversary of Eastern Kentucky University's role in higher education.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to extend the congratulations of the Congress on the 100th anniversary of Eastern Kentucky University's role in higher education.
